name: BOOMEROAD
description:
■『BOOMEROAD』

BOOMEROAD is an exhilarating action-adventure game in which players slide along boomerang rails you will create.
You will be playing as the main character, Boomy. Boomy has to reach a tower with a mysterious boomerang while overcoming the obstacles and aims for the Ancient Tower.

▼A new experience in the vast sky

The game is set in an ancient ruin floating in the sky, and the player slides through the vast skies at their own will while searching for the Artifacts.

▼Aiming, throwing, and sliding. Easy operation and exhilarating action

The exhilarating action with the "rail-drawing boomerang" is the charm of this game.

▼Numerous gimmicks to make the action more fun

You will aim for the Ancient Tower with the boomerang while dodging lasers and using a blower to generate wind on several occasions.

■"TimeAttackMode" to test your skills

Choose efficient routes and skillfully handle boomerangs to reach the goal quickly.



■The setting is an ancient ruin floating in the sky

The game is set in an ancient ruin floating in the sky.
Boomy, a young archaeologist boy, visits the ruins as he believes in the legend that there are hidden treasures of an ancient civilization in the towers of the ruins.
Using one of the ruin's artifacts, a boomerang that can draw rails, he adventures through the ruins, which are shrouded in the veil of secrecy.

▼The Ancient City area is where you can enjoy the clear sky

▼The Ancient Fortress City area is where you can immerse yourself in the shining moonlit night view

▼Collect the "Oparts" hidden in the ancient ruins
